ARABIC: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He saw some of the Greatest Signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed he saw some of the greatest signs of His Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and he certainly saw some of the greatest Signs of His Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He certainly saw the greatest (signs) of the existence of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed he saw the supreme signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed he saw of the greatest Ssgns of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly he saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Indeed, he saw one of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily he saw one of the greater revelations of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He saw some of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly he beheld of the sign of his Lord, the greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly he saw some of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For truly did he see, of the Signs of his Lord, the Greatest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed he (Muhammad SAW) did see, of the Greatest Signs, of his Lord (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: for indeed he saw one of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He saw some of the Great Signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:18]   Verily he saw, in it, some of the greatest signs of his Lord, [some of] the most awesome [of these signs]. He thus saw from among the marvels of the Realm (malakūt) a green drape (rafraf) that obscured the [entire] horizon of the heaven and Gabriel with his six hundred wings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily he) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) (saw one of the greater revelations of his Lord) he saw one of the greatest marvels of his Lord.
